Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), cmake, cython3, gfortran, dh-sequence-python3, dh-sequence-numpy3, libpython3-all-dev, dh-sequence-pkgkde-symbolshelper, python3-numpy, python3-setuptools, python3-all
Description: Fixed-Rate Compressed Floating-Point Arrays This is a compressed format for representing multidimensional floating-point and integer arrays.  zfp provides compressed-array classes that support high throughput read and write random access to individual array elements. zfp also supports serial and parallel (OpenMP and CUDA) compression of whole arrays, e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and from disk.
Package-List: libzfp-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libzfp1 deb libs optional arch=any python3-zfpy deb python optional arch=any zfp deb science optional arch=any
